title: Create a Scene
description: Learn how to create a scene and add dialogue to your visual novel

steps.title: Creating Scenes & Dialogue
steps.content: Scenes are the building blocks of your visual novel. Each scene contains characters, backgrounds, and dialogue.

steps.title: Add a New Object
steps.content: Click the + button to add objects to your scene. You can add characters, text boxes, images, and more.

steps.title: Scene Palette
steps.content: The Scene Palette provides quick access to common scene objects. Drag items from here to the Scene View.

steps.title: Select & Move Objects
steps.content: Click objects in the Scene View to select them. Drag to reposition, or use the Inspector for precise control.

steps.title: Edit Properties
steps.content: With an object selected, modify its properties in the Inspector. Change text, colors, opacity, and animation settings.

steps.title: Add Dialogue Nodes
steps.content: Switch to the Story Graph to add dialogue. Right-click to create nodes, then connect them to define the flow.
